sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Heading, Flex, Text, Image, Box} from "rebass";
import { Hero, Laptop, Phone } from "react-landing-page";
import CheckCircleIcon from '@material-ui/icons/CheckCircle';
import LaunchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Launch';
import Sunflower from './Sunflower';
import { Link } from '@material-ui/core';

export default function Product(props: any) {
    const features = [
        {
            header: "Designed to support both teaching and learning.",
            content: ["Provides set of tools for building courses and solutions for teachers struggling with the workload of teaching hundreds of students.", 
            "Provides students with an all-in-one learning platform (lecture video, online materials, assignment submission, tests, results...)"]
        },
        {
            header: "Detect potential mental health symptoms.",
            img: "MentalHealth.jpg",
            content: ["Based on personal metrics such as attendance, progress and grades, Sunflower is able to help teachers in detecting unusual symptoms of their students."]
        },
        {
            header: "Personalized analytic dashboard.",
            content: ["Sunflower collects data from user activities to analyse and visualise on a dashboard with the use of charts, graphs, tables and infographics.",
            "Provides students with a comprehensive and personalised snapshot of their performance, teachers with overview metrics of their classes."],
            laptop: "image2.png",
            phone: "",
            img: ""
        },
        {
            header: "Minimalist interface design with simple English.",
            content: [
                "Non-functional decorative elements are eliminated to make the system more friendly with low-tech people.",
                "Complex sentences are avoided in the system as a solution for issues related to language barriers that face students in non-native English speaking countries. "
            ],
            img: ""
        },
        {
            header: "Use anytime, anywhere, on any device.",
            content: [
                "Sunflower is empowered by responsive design, it is easily accessible anytime, from anywhere, on any device.",
                "Sunflower is optimized so it can run on the low-performance equipments, slow and unreliable internet in developing countries."
            ],
            phone: "phone_hompage.png",
            laptop: "hompage.png"
        }
    ]
    
    return (
        <Hero>
            <Flex width="100%" minHeight="50vh" justifyContent="center" backgroundColor="#F6F6F6" flexWrap="wrap">
                <Flex flexDirection="column" width={[1, 1, 3/5]} padding={10} justifyContent="center">
                    <Heading textAlign="center" fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[50]} fontWeight={500}>What's <Sunflower size={50}></Sunflower>?</Heading>
                    <Text fontSize={[30, 35]} marginTop={20}>
                        A web-based learning management system that aims to empower the digital education revolution.
                    </Text>
                    <Text fontSize={[30, 35]} marginTop={20}>
                        The development of Sunflower is supported by Engage Online. <Link href="https://www.engageonline.com.au/"><LaunchIcon/></Link>
                    </Text>
                </Flex>
                <Flex width={[1, 1, 2/5]} justifyContent="center">
                <Laptop mt={3} src="webapp.png"/>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Flex width="100%" minHeight="50vh" flexDirection="row" padding={20} flexWrap="wrap-reverse" justifyContent="space-around">
                <Flex flexDirection="column" width={[1, 1, 1/2]} justifyContent="center">
                    <Heading fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[50]} fontWeight={500}>Our client</Heading>
                    <Heading fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[30]} fontWeight={500}>EO1 Ltd Pty - Engage Online</Heading>
                    <Text fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={30}>“Engage Online is a company with our head office located in the beautiful city of Wollongong. Engage Online proudly works with a wide range of businesses, bringing diverse challenges and solutions.” </Text>
                </Flex>
                <Image src="eo1.png" width={400}>
                </Image>
            </Flex>
            <Flex width="100%" minHeight="50vh" flexDirection="column" padding={20} justifyContent="space-around" backgroundColor="#F6F6F6">
                <Heading fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[50]} fontWeight={500} textAlign="center">Target Users</Heading>
                <Flex alignSelf="center" justifyContent="space-around" flexWrap="wrap">
                    <Image src="users1.png" height={700}></Image>
                    <Flex flexDirection="column">
                        <Image src="users2.png" height={300}></Image>
                        <Image src="users3.png" height={400}></Image>
                    </Flex>
                </Flex>

            </Flex>
            <Flex minHeight="50vh" flexDirection="column">
                <Heading fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[50]} fontWeight={500} textAlign="center">This project started when...</Heading>
                <Flex width={[1]} justifyContent="space-evenly" alignItems="center" flexWrap="wrap" alignSelf="center"> 
                    <Flex width={[1, 1, 1/3]} justifyContent="center">
                        <Image src="student_per_teacher.png" width={300}></Image>
                    </Flex>
                    <Flex flexDirection="column" padding={20} fontSize={[25, 30]} width={[1, 1, 2/3]}>
                        <Text>Mental health issues are difficult to identify in less economically developed countries… </Text>
                        <Text marginTop={20}>The education system is overloaded to a point where teachers are unable to identify mental health issues in their classes of children.</Text>
                    </Flex>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Flex minHeight="50vh" justifyContent="center" backgroundColor="#202121" flexDirection="column" alignItems="center" padding={20}>
                <Flex fontSize={[25, 30]} width={[1, 2/3]} alignItems="center" color="white">
                    <Text>"In just the past 3 months, our organisation has had 300+ schools, 50+ very large organisations and a large local government reach out requesting assistance in helping with these issues any way we can (approximately +2.5million people)."</Text>
                </Flex>
                <Flex fontSize={[25, 30]} width={[1, 2/3]} color="#F3CB3B" justifyContent="flex-end">
                    <Link href="https://www.engageonline.com.au/" color="inherit"><Text style={{fontStyle: "italic"}}>Engage Online</Text></Link>
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            <Flex minHeight="50vh" width={[1, 2/3]} justifyContent="space-evenly" alignItems="center" flexWrap="wrap"> 
                <Image src="features.png" height={300} margin={10}></Image>
                <Flex flexDirection="column" justifyContent="flex-start" alignItems="flex-start" height="100%" margin={10}>
                    <Heading fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[50]} fontWeight={500} textAlign="center">Features</Heading>
                    {features.map(feature => <Flex margin={10} fontSize={[20, 25]} alignItems="center">
                        <CheckCircleIcon htmlColor="#99C11F" fontSize="inherit"/><Text>{feature.header}</Text></Flex>)}
                </Flex>
            </Flex>
            {
                features.map((data, idx) => {
                    return (
                        <Flex width="100%" minHeight="50vh" justifyContent="space-evenly" backgroundColor={idx%2?"white":"#E5E5E5"} 
                            flexDirection="column" flexWrap="wrap">
                            <Flex width={.9} alignSelf="center" flexDirection={idx%2?"row":"row-reverse"} justifyContent={["center", "center","space-between"]} flexWrap={"wrap"}>
                            {
                                (data.laptop || data.phone || data.img) &&
                                <Flex width={[1, 1, 1/2]} justifyContent="center" padding={10}>
                                    {data.laptop && <Laptop src={data.laptop} alt={data.header} sx={{margin: 10}} alignSelf="center"/>}
                                    {data.phone && <Phone src={data.phone} alt={data.header} sx={{margin: 10}} alignSelf="center"/>}
                                    {data.img && <Image src={data.img} alt={data.header} sx={{margin: 10}} alignSelf="center"/>}
                                </Flex>
                            }
                            <Flex flexDirection="column" width={[1, 1, 1/2]} marginTop="20" justifyContent="center" style={{flexGrow: 1}}>

                                <Heading fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[30, 40, 50]} fontWeight={500}>{data.header}</Heading>
                                {
                                    data.content.map(line => (<Text fontFamily={"inherit"} fontSize={[25, 30, 35]} fontWeight={300}>{line}</Text>))
                                }
                            </Flex>
                            </Flex>
                        </Flex>
                    )
                })
            }
        </Hero>
        
    )
}
